mapper.select: select id ,user_name as userName ,event_type as eventType ,sum(yb) yb ,max(current_yb) currentYb ,sum(times) times ,log_time as logTime from bind_yb_gain where 1=1 and event_type in (#{item}) and user_name = #{userName} and date_format(log_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{startTime} and date_format(log_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endTime} group by log_time,user_name,event_type order by log_time desc,yb desc
